<script type="text/javascript">
window.onload = function(){

		if ($("label[for='customfield_10524']").length > 0)
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10524']").parent();
	    else
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10524']").parent().parent();
	    
	    if ($("label[for='customfield_10326']").length > 0)
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10326']").parent();
	    else
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10326']").parent().parent();

        var duplicateIssues = AJS.$('#customfield_11450').parent();
                
                               
                //Capturing the value of resolution at the time of loading the page. The value will always be 1 if screen is loading for the first time
		//as default value is 'Fixed'. If it is loading after a failed attempt, then the value will be different.
                var resolutionValue = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                // Need to hide all resolution values other than 'Fixed' and 'Won't Fix'
		                 
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='5']").remove();  // Hide "Cannot Reproduce"  
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='6']").remove();  // Hide "Deferred"     
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='7']").remove();  // Hide "No Issue"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='8']").remove();  // Hide "Rejected"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='9']").remove();  // Hide "n/a" 
                                                               
                // Pre-select "Fixed" resolution and hide all fields related to "Won't Fix" and "Duplicate"
                if(resolutionValue=="1"){
                	
                	resolutionDescription.show();
			decisionRationale.hide();
			duplicateIssues.hide();
			
                }
	      else if(resolutionValue=="3"){	          
	      	duplicateIssues.show();	          
	              decisionRationale.hide();	          
	              resolutionDescription.hide();
	              
	      }
	      
	      else {	          
	      	duplicateIssues.hide();					          	          
	      	decisionRationale.show()  						          
	      	resolutionDescription.hide();						                         		                            
	      	}							                        
               					            			       		        
                
                // React to change of resolution value and show/hide fields accordingly
    AJS.$("#resolution").change(function() 
    { 
        var resolution = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                                
                                if(resolution=="1"){
			                       	
			                       	resolutionDescription.show();
			       			decisionRationale.hide();
			       			duplicateIssues.hide();
			       			
			                       }     
			                       		       		                
			       		       else if(resolution=="3"){        
			       		        	duplicateIssues.show();        
			       		                decisionRationale.hide();        
			       		                resolutionDescription.hide();
			       		                
			       		        }
			       		        else {	          
						          duplicateIssues.hide();	          
							  decisionRationale.show()          
							  resolutionDescription.hide();                       		                            
								                        
               					 }
                
    });
};
AJS.$(function () {
 
    function initMyCustomField(dialog) {
        AJS.$(dialog || document.body).each(function () {
            var $dialog = AJS.$(this);
            
        });
    }
 
    
window.onload();
 
    AJS.$(document).bind("dialogContentReady", function (e, dialog) {
        window.onload(dialog.get$popupContent());
    });
 
});
</script>

fields.description:
Description:
 # The controller shall support Simplex/Duplex Time Proportional Control, Simplex/Duplex Current Proportional Control, Current and Time Proportional Combination Control, Position Proportional Control
 ## It shall be able to set Cycle Time for each relay
 ## It shall be able to set Contact Relay Output Normal Status for each relay
 ## It shall be able to set Current Duplex Range Algorithm for duplex output with at least one current output
 ## It shall be able to set Motor Time for Position Proportional Control
 ## If Current Output channel is not used, it can works as an Auxiliary Output
 # The controller shall support manual setting of Output Value
 # The controller shall support field calibration

Using Method:
 # GUI
 # Modbus
 # Ethernet
 # Bluetooth

Definition of Done:
 # Output Value can be converted to correct output signals along with settings.
 # The accuracy of Current Output is ± 0.05% of full scale typical.

<script type="text/javascript">
window.onload = function(){

		if ($("label[for='customfield_10524']").length > 0)
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10524']").parent();
	    else
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10524']").parent().parent();
	    
	    if ($("label[for='customfield_10326']").length > 0)
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10326']").parent();
	    else
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10326']").parent().parent();

        var duplicateIssues = AJS.$('#customfield_11450').parent();
                
                               
                //Capturing the value of resolution at the time of loading the page. The value will always be 1 if screen is loading for the first time
		//as default value is 'Fixed'. If it is loading after a failed attempt, then the value will be different.
                var resolutionValue = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                // Need to hide all resolution values other than 'Fixed' and 'Won't Fix'
		                 
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='5']").remove();  // Hide "Cannot Reproduce"  
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='6']").remove();  // Hide "Deferred"     
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='7']").remove();  // Hide "No Issue"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='8']").remove();  // Hide "Rejected"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='9']").remove();  // Hide "n/a" 
                                                               
                // Pre-select "Fixed" resolution and hide all fields related to "Won't Fix" and "Duplicate"
                if(resolutionValue=="1"){
                	
                	resolutionDescription.show();
			decisionRationale.hide();
			duplicateIssues.hide();
			
                }
	      else if(resolutionValue=="3"){	          
	      	duplicateIssues.show();	          
	              decisionRationale.hide();	          
	              resolutionDescription.hide();
	              
	      }
	      
	      else {	          
	      	duplicateIssues.hide();					          	          
	      	decisionRationale.show()  						          
	      	resolutionDescription.hide();						                         		                            
	      	}							                        
               					            			       		        
                
                // React to change of resolution value and show/hide fields accordingly
    AJS.$("#resolution").change(function() 
    { 
        var resolution = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                                
                                if(resolution=="1"){
			                       	
			                       	resolutionDescription.show();
			       			decisionRationale.hide();
			       			duplicateIssues.hide();
			       			
			                       }     
			                       		       		                
			       		       else if(resolution=="3"){        
			       		        	duplicateIssues.show();        
			       		                decisionRationale.hide();        
			       		                resolutionDescription.hide();
			       		                
			       		        }
			       		        else {	          
						          duplicateIssues.hide();	          
							  decisionRationale.show()          
							  resolutionDescription.hide();                       		                            
								                        
               					 }
                
    });
};
AJS.$(function () {
 
    function initMyCustomField(dialog) {
        AJS.$(dialog || document.body).each(function () {
            var $dialog = AJS.$(this);
            
        });
    }
 
    
window.onload();
 
    AJS.$(document).bind("dialogContentReady", function (e, dialog) {
        window.onload(dialog.get$popupContent());
    });
 
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
window.onload = function(){

		if ($("label[for='customfield_10524']").length > 0)
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10524']").parent();
	    else
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10524']").parent().parent();
	    
	    if ($("label[for='customfield_10326']").length > 0)
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10326']").parent();
	    else
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10326']").parent().parent();

        var duplicateIssues = AJS.$('#customfield_11450').parent();
                
                               
                //Capturing the value of resolution at the time of loading the page. The value will always be 1 if screen is loading for the first time
		//as default value is 'Fixed'. If it is loading after a failed attempt, then the value will be different.
                var resolutionValue = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                // Need to hide all resolution values other than 'Fixed' and 'Won't Fix'
		                 
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='5']").remove();  // Hide "Cannot Reproduce"  
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='6']").remove();  // Hide "Deferred"     
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='7']").remove();  // Hide "No Issue"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='8']").remove();  // Hide "Rejected"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='9']").remove();  // Hide "n/a" 
                                                               
                // Pre-select "Fixed" resolution and hide all fields related to "Won't Fix" and "Duplicate"
                if(resolutionValue=="1"){
                	
                	resolutionDescription.show();
			decisionRationale.hide();

<script type="text/javascript">
window.onload = function(){

		if ($("label[for='customfield_10524']").length > 0)
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10524']").parent();
	    else
	        var resolutionDescription = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10524']").parent().parent();
	    
	    if ($("label[for='customfield_10326']").length > 0)
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='customfield_10326']").parent();
	    else
	        var decisionRationale = AJS.$("label[for='cbcustomfield_10326']").parent().parent();

        var duplicateIssues = AJS.$('#customfield_11450').parent();
                
                               
                //Capturing the value of resolution at the time of loading the page. The value will always be 1 if screen is loading for the first time
		//as default value is 'Fixed'. If it is loading after a failed attempt, then the value will be different.
                var resolutionValue = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                // Need to hide all resolution values other than 'Fixed' and 'Won't Fix'
		                 
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='5']").remove();  // Hide "Cannot Reproduce"  
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='6']").remove();  // Hide "Deferred"     
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='7']").remove();  // Hide "No Issue"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='8']").remove();  // Hide "Rejected"
		                AJS.$("#resolution option[value='9']").remove();  // Hide "n/a" 
                                                               
                // Pre-select "Fixed" resolution and hide all fields related to "Won't Fix" and "Duplicate"
                if(resolutionValue=="1"){
                	
                	resolutionDescription.show();
			decisionRationale.hide();
			duplicateIssues.hide();
			
                }
	      else if(resolutionValue=="3"){	          
	      	duplicateIssues.show();	          
	              decisionRationale.hide();	          
	              resolutionDescription.hide();
	              
	      }
	      
	      else {	          
	      	duplicateIssues.hide();					          	          
	      	decisionRationale.show()  						          
	      	resolutionDescription.hide();						                         		                            
	      	}							                        
               					            			       		        
                
                // React to change of resolution value and show/hide fields accordingly
    AJS.$("#resolution").change(function() 
    { 
        var resolution = AJS.$('#resolution').val();
                                
                                if(resolution=="1"){
			                       	
			                       	resolutionDescription.show();
			       			decisionRationale.hide();
